item.title: Nagasaki mayor warns of nuclear war 80 years after atom bomb attack
item.description: Shiro Suzuki calls for a halt to armed conflicts on the anniversary of the atom bomb attack.

item.title: Rapidly growing fire prompts thousands of evacuations in California
item.description: The Canyon Fire, which began on Thursday afternoon, has blazed through nearly 5,000 acres in less than 24 hours.

item.title: Trump and Putin to meet in Alaska for Ukraine talks next week
item.description: The announcement comes hours after the US leader signals Ukraine may have to cede territory to end the war.

item.title: Military veteran arrested week after fatal Montana shooting
item.description: Authorities have not given a motive in the attack but said he was a regular at the pub.

item.title: Azerbaijan and Armenia sign peace deal at White House summit with Trump
item.description: "It's been a long time coming," Trump said of the agreement, which will reopen key transport routes.
